channel.title: Hideaki Hata | NAIST
channel.description: Recent content on Hideaki Hata | NAIST

item.title: Abstract
item.description: I am an Assistant Professor in Graduate School of Information Science at Nara Institute of Science and Technology, Japan. I received M.Sc. Ph.D degrees in Graduate School of Information Science and Technology from Osaka University.

item.title: New papers
item.description: Hideaki Hata, Mingyu Guo, and Ali Babar, Understanding the Heterogeneity of Contributors in Bug Bounty Programs, In Proc. of 11th ACM / IEEE International Symposium on Empirical Software Engineering and Measurement (ESEM 2017). Nuttapon Lertwittayatrai, Raula Gaikovina Kula, Saya Onoue, Hideaki Hata, Arnon Rungsawang, Pattara Leelaprute, and Kenichi Matsumoto, Extracting Insights from the Topology of the Javascript Package Ecosystem, In Proc. of 24th Asia-Pacific Software Engineering Conference (APSEC2017). See Figure.

item.title: Activities
item.description: Journal Associate Editor IEICE Transactions on Information and Systems (2017-) Reviews Journal of Systems and Software IEICE Transactions on Information and Systems IEEE Transactions on Services Computing Conference 2018 APSEC (Local arrangement), SEmotion (PC member), IWESEP (Steering member) 2017 COMPSAC (PC member), SANER (ERA track review), APSEC (Short papers and posters track review), CHASE (PC member), SEmotion (PC member), IWESEP (Steering member), BCD (Publicity co-chairs and PC member) 2016 COMPSAC (PC member), SANER (Tool track review, ERA track review, and Local arrangement), MSR (PC member), CHASE (PC member), IWESEP (General chair) 2015 COMPSAC (PC member) 2014 COMPSAC (PC member), IWESEP (PC member), SERA (PC member) 2013 IWESEP (Tutorial chair and PC member) 2012 IWESEP (PC member) 2011 IWESEP (PC member) 2010 IWESEP (PC member)

item.title: Publications
item.description: Conference Proceedings Katsuya Ogami, Raula Gaikovina Kula, Hideaki Hata, Takashi Ishio, and Kenichi Matsumoto, Using High-Rising Cities to Visualize Performance in Real-Time, In Proc. of 5th IEEE Working Conference on Software Visualization (VISSOFT 2017), 33-42, September 2017. See Figure, Tool, Slides, Video 1, and Video 2. Pannavat Terdchanakul, Hideaki Hata, Passakorn Phannachitta, and Kenichi Matsumoto, Bug or Not? Bug Report Classification using N-Gram Idf, In Proc. of 33rd IEEE International Conference on Software Maintenance and Evolution (ICSME 2017), pp.
